full_summary:
# EN439-232058 LTDLC Phase 1A.3 - Office Furniture

## Tender Details

* **Reference Number:** WS4065674493-Doc4065733317
* **Solicitation Number:** WS4065674493
* **Publication Date:** June 27, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** July 26, 2023 14:00:00
* **Amendment Date:** July 19, 2023
* **Contract Start Date:** August 7, 2023
* **Contract End Date:** No expected end date
* **Tender Status:** Expired

## Procurement Details

* **Type of Procurement:** Request for Proposal (RFP) sourced from a Supply Arrangement
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive Open Bidding
* **Category:** Government Direct
* **Goods or Services:** Office Furniture (UNSPSC Code: *56101700*)
* **Description:** PSPC requires office furniture for delivery and installation at the Gatineau, Quebec (Hull) facility.

## Contact Details

* **Contracting Authority:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada
* **Contact:** Nancy (SPAC/PSPC) at nancy.sell@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

## Requirements

* Closing Deadline for Proposals: July 26, 2023 14:00:00
* Technical and Commercial evaluation of proposals will be carried out by PSPC
* Criteria for selection: Best Value
* PSPC will notify its intent to award a contract to the successful bidder in writing within 30 days of the closing date

This tender has expired. Potential bidders are not encouraged to submit their tender proposals. The closing date was on **July 26, 2023, 14:00:00**. The Contract End Date is unspecified. There is no security requirement associated with this tender. Offered Terms can be determined on PSPC Shopping.
